item.title:
RT by @RoughTradeBooks: Egg and Spoon - Rose Blake 🥚🥄
from @RoughTradeBooks
The artist & illustrator Rose Blake @iamroseblake tells the story of a childhood fuelled on art & creativity, infused with travel & steeled by the more quotidian aspects of family life growing up with the artist Peter Blake.
item.dc:creator: @ArtdataLondon
item.description:
Egg and Spoon - Rose Blake 🥚🥄

from @RoughTradeBooks

The artist & illustrator Rose Blake @iamroseblake tells the story of a childhood fuelled on art & creativity, infused with travel & steeled by the more quotidian aspects of family life growing up with the artist Peter Blake.

item.title: In case you missed @iamroseblake talking all things Egg and Spoon 🥚🥄 with @RobertElms prior to celebrating her dad’s birthday @glastonbury on Friday, you can listen back here…👇 Happy Birthday Peter Blake 🥳🎉 #peterblakeis90 #youveseenthebadges

item.title: Tune in today from 2pm to @sohoradio culture channel and get stressed writing poems with special guest poet @MollyNaylor and hosts @joedunthorne and @EllaFrears Tweet your poems to @StressTestSoho whilst you’re at it 🤪
item.dc:creator: @RoughTradeBooks
item.description:

item.title: RT by @RoughTradeBooks: Thanks to everyone who came to the show thanks @RoughTradeBooks for this wonderful photo I think I might of Channelled the vibe of the guy who sang “ rock me Amadeus “ in the 1980s in this photo

item.title: RT by @RoughTradeBooks: L’Angle Du Hasard exhibition by Robert Rubbish at James Jackson in Lillie Rd. SW6 goes out in style tomorrow with @RoughTradeBooks closing event from 1pm. Robert will be interviewed about his oeuvre ‘The Poetess Of The Pyramids’.
item.dc:creator: @robertrubbish
item.description: L’Angle Du Hasard exhibition by Robert Rubbish at James Jackson in Lillie Rd. SW6 goes out in style tomorrow with @RoughTradeBooks closing event from 1pm. Robert will be interviewed about his oeuvre ‘The Poetess Of The Pyramids’.

item.description: Be there…

item.title: RT by @RoughTradeBooks: 51. In The End It Was All About Love by @Okwonga. A beautiful (love) letter to Berlin, to grief and loss, to loneliness and belonging. You'll want to carry it around in your pocket and read from it like a book of psalms.
item.dc:creator: @rednewsom
item.description: 51. In The End It Was All About Love by @Okwonga. A beautiful (love) letter to Berlin, to grief and loss, to loneliness and belonging. You'll want to carry it around in your pocket and read from it like a book of psalms.
